## CurrentGameManager class

A current game manager - to fetch and manage the live games.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class CurrentGameManager implements BaseManager<CurrentGame> 
```
<b>Implements:</b> [BaseManager](./shieldbow.basemanager.md)<!-- -->&lt;[CurrentGame](./shieldbow.currentgame.md)

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(client)](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new instance of the <code>CurrentGameManager</code> class |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [cache](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.cache.md) |  | Collection&lt;string, [CurrentGame](./shieldbow.currentgame.md)<!-- -->&gt; | The cached live games (mapped by summoner IDs). |
|  [client](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.client.md) |  | [Client](./shieldbow.client.md) | The client that instantiated the manager. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [fetch(id, options)](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.fetch.md) |  | Fetches the live game for the given summoner ID.<!-- -->This method is a special case where the cache is ignored by default. |
|  [fetchFeatured()](./shieldbow.currentgamemanager.fetchfeatured.md) |  | Fetch a list of featured games. These games are not cached. |
